resources.string:
INSTRUCTIONS:
Choose the sound you want to hear and then activate Unsheathe The Phone.
If you want you can adjust sensibility: the higher the value, the more often you're gonna hear the sound; the lower the value, the faster you'll have to move your phone to hear it.
If you want more accuracy choose "High" instead of "Normal", it's gonna be more accurate but it's also gonna take more battery.

By activating the application, a service will start as soon as your phone go in lock screen state. This will allow you to get real sound of an unsheathing sword every time you pick up your phone.\nIf you don\'t hear anything remember to check the media volume!
ATTENTION: This mean you\'re gonna have something always running in background and even if this App it\'s not such a \"battery eater\", I suggest you to disable it when you no longer need it.
Choose the sound you want to hear:
